bibl.title: The Palaeography of Later Roman Cursive.
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. of Toronto. Summary in DA 51 (1990-1991) pp. 3491-3492-A. - Sixty Italian ("Ravenna") papyri are described, with a new classification of the hands.
bibl.seg: GUDERIAN Gregory Joseph, The Palaeography of Later Roman Cursive.
Diss. Univ. of Toronto. Summary in DA 51 (1990-1991) pp. 3491-3492-A. - Sixty Italian ("Ravenna") papyri are described, with a new classification of the hands.
